item.description: More details to come. Meanwhile, please RSVP "yes," "no" or "maybe" (you can always change it later). And keep checking back here for updates on our activities.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for blonde hair, a black or khaki-colored apron and a name tag--or just yell, "Who's Anne"? But feel free to use our self-service check-in table to sign in, pick up a name tag, pay and find a place to sit.
item.why: This is a creative, lively and generous group, willing to share supplies, techniques and information to make sure everyone has a good time.

group.name: New England Artist Trading Cards Plus (ATCs+) Meetup Group

item.name: March ATC+ Meetup in Wellesley
